content:
DataGridComboBoxColumn Class

Definition

Represents a DataGrid column that hosts ComboBox controls in its cells.

In this Article

public class DataGridComboBoxColumn : System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn
Inheritance
Object
DispatcherObject
DependencyObject
System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn

Remarks

Use DataGridComboBoxColumn to display data where there is a set of items to choose from, such as an enumeration. DataGridComboBoxColumn allows users to select an item from a drop-down list. The following illustration shows a DataGridComboBoxColumn.

To populate the drop-down list, first set the ItemsSource property for the ComboBox by using one of the following options:

  • A static resource. For more information, see StaticResource Markup Extension.

  • An x:Static code entity. For more information, see x:Static Markup Extension.

  • An inline collection of ComboBoxItem types.

    Once the ItemsSource is set, bind the selected item in the ComboBox to the data item for the row that the cell is in. You can set the binding by using one of the following properties:

Property Description
TextBinding Sets the binding path of the text for the currently selected item.
SelectedItemBinding Sets the binding path of the object that is currently selected.
SelectedValueBinding Sets the binding path to the value of the selected item specified by the SelectedValuePath property.

When the IsReadOnly property is set to true, users cannot edit the column and they will not be able to see the drop-down list.

If you want to display other types of data, DataGrid provides the following column types:

Column Type Data Display
DataGridHyperlinkColumn Use to display URI data.
DataGridCheckBoxColumn Use to display Boolean data.
DataGridTextColumn Use to display text.

If you want to use other controls in your DataGrid, you can create your own column types by using DataGridTemplateColumn.

Initializes a new instance of the DataGridComboBoxColumn class.

Fields

Identifies the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.DisplayMemberPath* dependency property.

Identifies the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValuePath* dependency property.

Properties

ClipboardContentBinding

Gets or sets the binding object to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard.

public override System.Windows.Data.BindingBase ClipboardContentBinding { get; set; }
Value
BindingBase

An object that represents the binding.

DefaultEditingElementStyle

Gets the default value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.EditingElementStyle* property.

public static System.Windows.Style DefaultEditingElementStyle { get; }
Value
Style

The default value of stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.EditingElementStyle*.

Remarks

This style is the same as the DefaultElementStyle.

If you are creating new styles for cells and you want to inherit some of the existing style elements, base the new style on DefaultEditingElementStyle by using the BasedOn property.

DefaultElementStyle

Gets the default value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.ElementStyle*.

public static System.Windows.Style DefaultElementStyle { get; }
Value
Style

The default value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.ElementStyle*.

Remarks

If you are creating new styles and you want to inherit some of the existing style elements, base the new style on DefaultElementStyle by using the BasedOn property.

DisplayMemberPath

Gets or sets a path to a value on the source object to provide the visual representation of the object.

public string DisplayMemberPath { get; set; }
Value
String

The path to a value on the source object. The registered default is an empty string (""). For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

Remarks

Use this property to define a simple template that describes how to display the data objects. Setting the DisplayMemberPath property is equivalent to setting the Path of the Text property binding in a template. The following template shows an example of the equivalent setting. 

<DataTemplate x:Key="displaymemberpath">
    <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=LastName}"/>
</DataTemplate>

This snippet ID 1 is used in multiple files: /xaml/window1.xaml, /CS/window1.xaml. Rename the duplicate ID to make it unique, and update the reference to the snippet ID in the topic(s).

EditingElementStyle

Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

public System.Windows.Style EditingElementStyle { get; set; }
Value
Style

The style that is used when rendering an editing element. The registered default is null. For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

Remarks

You can reset the default EditingElementStyle by getting the DefaultEditingElementStyle.

ElementStyle

Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell that is not in editing mode.

public System.Windows.Style ElementStyle { get; set; }
Value
Style

The style that is used when rendering a display-only element. The registered default is null. For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

Remarks

You can reset the default ElementStyle by getting the DefaultElementStyle.

ItemsSource

Gets or sets a collection that is used to generate the content of the combo box control.

public System.Collections.IEnumerable ItemsSource { get; set; }
Value
IEnumerable

A collection that is used to generate the content of the combo box control. The registered default is null. For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

Remarks

This property populates the drop-down list for all the combo boxes in the column. This is equivalent to the ItemsSource property on ItemsControl.

SelectedItemBinding

Gets or sets the binding for the currently selected item.

public virtual System.Windows.Data.BindingBase SelectedItemBinding { get; set; }
Value
BindingBase

The binding for the selected item.

Remarks

Setting the SelectedItemBinding property is equivalent to setting the SelectedItem property of ComboBox.

SelectedValueBinding

Gets or sets the value of the selected item, obtained by using stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValuePath*.

public virtual System.Windows.Data.BindingBase SelectedValueBinding { get; set; }
Value
BindingBase

The binding for the selected value.

Remarks

The selected value is determined by the SelectedValuePath property of the selected item. The selected value path is a property on the selected item object. Setting this property is equivalent to setting the SelectedValue property of ComboBox.

SelectedValuePath

Gets or sets the path that is used to get the stem.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedValue* from the stem.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem*.

public string SelectedValuePath { get; set; }
Value
String

The path to get the selected value. The registered default is an empty string (""). For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

Remarks

The SelectedValuePath property allows you to display a value of the selected item object by setting the path to that property. This is equivalent to the SelectedValuePath property on Selector.

TextBinding

Gets or sets the binding for the text in the text box portion of the ComboBox control.

public virtual System.Windows.Data.BindingBase TextBinding { get; set; }
Value
BindingBase

The binding for the text of the currently selected item.

Remarks

Setting the TextBinding property is equivalent to setting the Text property of the ComboBox control.

TextBlockComboBoxStyleKey

Gets the resource key for the style to apply to a read-only combo box.

public static System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey TextBlockComboBoxStyleKey { get; }
Value
ComponentResourceKey

The key for the style.

Methods

CancelCellEdit(FrameworkElement,Object)

Causes the column cell being edited to revert to the specified value.

protected override void CancelCellEdit (System.Windows.FrameworkElement editingElement, object uneditedValue);
editingElement
FrameworkElement

The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

uneditedValue
Object

The previous, unedited value in the cell being edited.

CommitCellEdit(FrameworkElement)

Performs any required validation before exiting the editing mode.

protected override bool CommitCellEdit (System.Windows.FrameworkElement editingElement);
editingElement
FrameworkElement

The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

Returns
Boolean

false if validation fails; otherwise, true.

GenerateEditingElement(DataGridCell,Object)

Gets a combo box control that is bound to the column's stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedItemBinding*, stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValueBinding*, and stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.TextBinding* values.

protected override System.Windows.FrameworkElement GenerateEditingElement (System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell cell, object dataItem);
cell
DataGridCell

The cell that will contain the generated element.

dataItem
Object

The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.

Returns
FrameworkElement

A new combo box control that is bound to the column's stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedItemBinding*, stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValueBinding*, and stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.TextBinding* values.

GenerateElement(DataGridCell,Object)

Gets a read-only combo box control that is bound to the column's stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedItemBinding*, stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValueBinding*, and stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.TextBinding* values.

protected override System.Windows.FrameworkElement GenerateElement (System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell cell, object dataItem);
cell
DataGridCell

The cell that will contain the generated element.

dataItem
Object

The data item represented by the row that contains the intended cell.

Returns
FrameworkElement

A new, read-only combo box control that is bound to the column's stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedItemBinding*, stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValueBinding*, and stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.TextBinding* values.

OnCoerceIsReadOnly(Boolean)

Determines the value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly* property based on property rules from the DataGrid that contains this column.

protected override bool OnCoerceIsReadOnly (bool baseValue);
baseValue
Boolean

The value that was passed to the delegate.

Returns
Boolean

true if the combo boxes in the column cannot be edited; otherwise, false.

OnSelectedItemBindingChanged(BindingBase,BindingBase)

Notifies the DataGrid when the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedItemBinding* property changes.

protected virtual void OnSelectedItemBindingChanged (System.Windows.Data.BindingBase oldBinding, System.Windows.Data.BindingBase newBinding);
oldBinding
BindingBase

The previous binding.

newBinding
BindingBase

The binding that the column has been changed to.

OnSelectedValueBindingChanged(BindingBase,BindingBase)

Notifies the DataGrid when the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.SelectedValueBinding* property changes.

protected virtual void OnSelectedValueBindingChanged (System.Windows.Data.BindingBase oldBinding, System.Windows.Data.BindingBase newBinding);
oldBinding
BindingBase

The previous binding.

newBinding
BindingBase

The binding that the column has been changed to.

OnTextBindingChanged(BindingBase,BindingBase)

Notifies the DataGrid when the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridComboBoxColumn.TextBinding* property changes.

protected virtual void OnTextBindingChanged (System.Windows.Data.BindingBase oldBinding, System.Windows.Data.BindingBase newBinding);
oldBinding
BindingBase

The previous binding.

newBinding
BindingBase

The binding that the column has been changed to.

PrepareCellForEdit(FrameworkElement,RoutedEventArgs)

Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.

protected override object PrepareCellForEdit (System.Windows.FrameworkElement editingElement, System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs editingEventArgs);
editingElement
FrameworkElement

The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

editingEventArgs
RoutedEventArgs

Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.

Returns
Object

The unedited value.

RefreshCellContent(FrameworkElement,String)

Refreshes the contents of a cell in the column in response to a binding change.

protected override void RefreshCellContent (System.Windows.FrameworkElement element, string propertyName);
element
FrameworkElement

The cell to update.

propertyName
String

The name of the column property that has changed.
